name: Post Mortem (itch) (JoGBear)
description:
You are a spirit, looking to inhabit a new body. You can possess monsters, but they won't last long. You'll have to use the monsters to transport you through the forest, and into a more stable host...

Sigmund Floyd, a serial killer through the 70s and 80s, is dead at 35. He was killed by his final victim, Diona [Redacted]. His mother, Amelia Floyd, was pressed for comment, "What an unradical dude."
